gameDetails.name: Wendake: Promo Tiles
gameDetails.description:
Wendake: Promo Tiles is a set of two tiles that were included in all games sent to Kickstarter backers and available for free with a purchase of the game at the 2017 SPIEL and Lucca fairs. The tiles are:

				
				
					Level 1 Action tile:No effect when activated on the Action side.
Ritual side works normally.
Worth 4 points at the end of the game.

				
				
					Level 3 Progress tile:At any point during your turn, you may move up to 2 points between any two Score Tracks of your choice.
